item.title: Log out Button Delay
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

It’s logging out. Why are you using the main server tick.

Use blakeman’s 2006scape reactor. It uses the logging in and out and it doesn’t use any main server tick.

item.title: Log out Button Delay
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Joseph69, post:1, topic:479010”]SERVER : PI

I have discovered a dupe with my server, and part of it is the log out button. I have been trying to add a 10 second limit to the log out button, but I’m having trouble, if anyone would like to provide me with a nice and secure, Logout void, I would love it.

My one is

public void logout() { synchronized (this) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - logoutDelay > 15000) { if (inPvP() || inWild() || safeTimer > 0); if (inFFA()) { getItems().deleteAllItems(); getPA().movePlayer(3089, 3499, 0); Misc.println("[ "+playerName+" ] Has just been removed from FFA minigame!"); } if (Dungeoneering.Dung(this)) { Dungeoneering.leaveDung(this); } dungn = 0; outStream.createFrame(109); properLogout = true; } else { sendMessage("You must wait a few seconds from being out of combat to logout."); } } }

Thank you. <3[/quote]
rename your void with delayedLogout.

And add this one.

public void logout() {
		Server.getTaskScheduler().schedule(new Task(2, true) {
			private int count = 16;

			@Override
			protected void execute() {
				if (count > 0) {
					PlayerHandler.messageToAll = count + "...";
					count--;
				} else {
					delayedLogout();
					stop();
				}
			}
		});
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Log out Button Delay
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

SERVER : PI

I have discovered a dupe with my server, and part of it is the log out button. I have been trying to add a 10 second limit to the log out button, but I’m having trouble, if anyone would like to provide me with a nice and secure, Logout void, I would love it.

My one is

public void logout() { synchronized (this) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - logoutDelay > 15000) { if (inPvP() || inWild() || safeTimer > 0); if (inFFA()) { getItems().deleteAllItems(); getPA().movePlayer(3089, 3499, 0); Misc.println("[ "+playerName+" ] Has just been removed from FFA minigame!"); } if (Dungeoneering.Dung(this)) { Dungeoneering.leaveDung(this); } dungn = 0; outStream.createFrame(109); properLogout = true; } else { sendMessage("You must wait a few seconds from being out of combat to logout."); } } }

Thank you. <3

Read full topic
